```{r}
source(here("R/almond_yield.R"))
source(here("R/profit.R"))
```

```{r}
tmin_feb <- climate %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  filter(month == 2) %>% 
  summarise(tmin_c = min(tmin_c)) %>% 
  pull(tmin_c)
# This model only pulls precipitation from January
precip_jan <- climate %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  filter(month == 1) %>% 
  summarise(precip = sum(precip)) %>% 
  pull(precip)
```

```{r}
yield <- almond_yield(tmin_feb = tmin_feb, precip_jan = precip_jan)
profit <- profit(yield = yield)
profit
```
